about_the_game:
"Starfinder RPG - Starfinder Flip-Mat - Enormous Battlefield

Get ready to throw down on the biggest battlefields we've ever published!
These immense 30 by 46 maps features a massive urban battleground and the ruins of an icy trench battlefield. Starfinder Flip-Mats present ready-to-use science-fantasy set pieces for the busy Game Master. If you need a bloody backdrop for the players to show their valor or a fitting ground for their mechs to shine, Starfinder Flip-Mat: Enormous Battlefield has you covered!

NOTE:  This product has been made specifically for the Starfinder ruleset, but can be used for 5E, Pathfinder, or any ruleset supported by Fantasy Grounds

This product is not a PDF or accessible outside of Fantasy Grounds. It has been lovingly converted for use within Fantasy Grounds and features the following additions:

  • All maps resized and set up with a preset grid to make combats easy to manage
  • All the images and handouts from the book available to share with your players as you need them
"
